00028 //========================================================================
00029 // There are three classes implemented in this file:
00030 //
00031 // CProcess - a base class for processes attached to the cooperative multitasker.
00032 //
00033 // CProcessManager - a cooperative multitasker that manages a list of objects derived
00034 //                   from CProcess, and calls OnUpdate() for each one each game loop.
00035 //
00036 // CWaitProcess - an example of a process you can use to time delay things
00037 //========================================================================
00038 
00039 //========================================================================
00040 //  Content References in Game Coding Complete - 2nd Edition
00041 // 
00042 //  CProcess class                      - Chapter 6, page 171-179
00043 //  CProcessManager class       - Chapter 6, page 171-179
00044 //  CWaitProcess class          - Chapter 6, page 179-181
00045 //========================================================================
00046

00048 #include "GameCodeStd.h"
00049 #include "CProcess.h"
00050 
00052 // CProcess constructor
00053 //
00054 CProcess::CProcess( int ntype, unsigned int uOrder ) :
00055         m_iType( ntype ),
00056         m_bKill( false ),
00057         m_bActive( true ),
00058         m_uProcessFlags( 0 ),
00059         m_bPaused( false ),
00060         m_bInitialUpdate( true )
00061 {
00062 }
00063 
00065 // CProcess destructor - 
00066 //   Note: always call Kill(), never delete.
00067 //
00068 CProcess::~CProcess()
00069 {
00070         // note - an explicit reset() of m_pNext is not necessary here....
00071 }
00072 
00074 // CProcess::Kill() - marks the process for cleanup
00075 // 
00076 void CProcess::Kill()
00077 {
00078         m_bKill=true;
00079 }
00080 
00082 // CProcess::SetNext - sets a process dependancy
00083 //
00084 // A->SetNext(B)  means that B will wait until A is finished
00085 //
00086 void CProcess::SetNext(shared_ptr<CProcess> nnext)
00087 {
00088         // note - an explicit reset() of m_pNext is not necessary here....
00089 
00090         m_pNext = nnext;
00091 }
00092 
00093 
00095 // CProcess attachement methods
00096 //
00097 // IsAttached() - Is this process attached to the manager?
00098 // SetAttached() - Marks it as attached. Called only by the manager.
00099 //
00100 bool CProcess::IsAttached() const
00101 {
00102         return (m_uProcessFlags & PROCESS_FLAG_ATTACHED) ? true : false;
00103 }
00104 
00105 void CProcess::SetAttached(const bool wantAttached)
00106 {
00107         if(wantAttached)
00108         {
00109                 m_uProcessFlags |= PROCESS_FLAG_ATTACHED;
00110         }
00111         else
00112         {
00113                 m_uProcessFlags &= ~PROCESS_FLAG_ATTACHED;
00114         }
00115 }
00116 
00118 // CProcessManager::Attach - gets a process to run
00119 //
00120 void CProcessManager::Attach( shared_ptr<CProcess> pProcess )
00121 {
00122         m_ProcessList.push_back(pProcess);
00123         pProcess->SetAttached(true);
00124 }
00125 
00127 // CProcessManager::Detach 
00128 //  - Detach a process from the process list, but don't delete it
00129 //
00130 void CProcessManager::Detach( shared_ptr<CProcess> pProcess )
00131 {
00132         m_ProcessList.remove(pProcess);
00133         pProcess->SetAttached(false);
00134 }
00135 
00137 // CProcessManager::IsProcessActive 
00138 //  - Are there any active processes of this type?
00139 //
00140 bool CProcessManager::IsProcessActive( int nType )
00141 {
00142         for(ProcessList::iterator i=m_ProcessList.begin(); i!=m_ProcessList.end(); ++i)
00143         {
00144                 // Check for living processes.  If they are dead, make sure no children 
00145                 // are attached as they will be brought to life on next cycle.
00146                 if ( ( *i )->GetType() == nType && 
00147                          ( ( *i )->IsDead() == false || ( *i )->GetNext() ) )
00148                         return true;
00149         }
00150         return false;
00151 }
00152 
00154 // CProcessManager::HasProcesses 
00155 //  - Are there any processes at all?
00156 //
00157 bool CProcessManager::HasProcesses()
00158 {
00159         return !m_ProcessList.empty();
00160 }
00161 
00163 // CProcessManager::DeleteProcessList 
00164 //  - run through the list of processes and detach them
00165 //
00166 void CProcessManager::DeleteProcessList()
00167 {
00168         for(ProcessList::iterator i = m_ProcessList.begin(); i != m_ProcessList.end(); )
00169         {
00170                 Detach(* (i++) );
00171         }
00172 }
00173 
00175 // CProcessManager::DeleteProcessList 
00176 //  - run through the list of processes and update them
00177 //
00178 void CProcessManager::UpdateProcesses(int deltaMilliseconds)
00179 {
00180         ProcessList::iterator i = m_ProcessList.begin();
00181         shared_ptr<CProcess> pNext;
00182 
00183         while ( i != m_ProcessList.end() )
00184         {
00185                 shared_ptr<CProcess> p = shared_ptr<CProcess>(*i);
00186                 ++i;
00187 
00188                 if ( p->IsDead() )
00189                 {
00190                         // Check for a child process and add if exists
00191                         pNext = p->GetNext();
00192                         if ( pNext )
00193                         {
00194                                 p->SetNext(shared_ptr<CProcess>((CProcess *)NULL));
00195                                 Attach( pNext );
00196                         }
00197                         Detach( p );
00198                 }
00199                 else if ( p->IsActive() && !p->IsPaused() )
00200                 {
00201                         p->OnUpdate( deltaMilliseconds );
00202                 }
00203         }
00204 }
00205 
00206 
00208 // CWaitProcess
00209 //  - wait a certain amount of time, then kill myself
00210 //
00211 CWaitProcess::CWaitProcess(unsigned int iNumMill ) :
00212         CProcess( PROC_WAIT, 0 ),
00213         m_uStart( 0 ),
00214         m_uStop( iNumMill )
00215 {
00216 }
00217 
00218 void CWaitProcess::OnUpdate( const int deltaMilliseconds )
00219 {
00220         CProcess::OnUpdate( deltaMilliseconds );
00221 
00222         if ( m_bActive )
00223         {
00224                 m_uStart += deltaMilliseconds;
00225                 
00226                 if ( m_uStart >= m_uStop )
00227                         Kill();
00228         }
00229 }
